data.text:
Congrats to the graduates of Flight Attendant Class C2206. We’re glad to have you onboard! The group joins more than 3,000 flight attendants currently serving our customers.

Interested in a career with Frontier? Learn more here: https://t.co/eXNhr6rApJ https://t.co/2xkjW5k8aR

data.text: Frontier honors and recognizes #Juneteenth. Juneteenth (short for “June Nineteenth”) marks the day when federal troops arrived in Galveston, Texas in 1865 to take control of the state and ensure that all enslaved people be freed. https://t.co/n9CPKRzMab #Juneteenth2022 https://t.co/uulFCegcoM

urls.title: What Is Juneteenth?
urls.description: Juneteenth (short for “June Nineteenth”) is a holiday commemorating this day, which marked an effective end of slavery in the United States.

data.text: @yanintl We are trying to reply to you via direct message. Please follow us on Twitter so that our direct messages can reach you.

-Edgar

@amymonsterawr Hello Amy. Thanks for contacting us, we are sorry to hear about your experience. Kindly send us a private message along with your 6-digit confirmation code and passenger names on the reservation if you still need assistance. -Bryan.

@RulerOf Hi Andrew, thanks for reaching out! Please DM us your 6-digit confirmation code along with the full name of the passenger to verify what fees applied on your reservation. We will be looking forward to hear back from you!
-Edgar
@MarkTravelBest1 HI, Thank you for reaching out to Frontier Airlines. Please send us a DM so we can further assist you. -Cindy

@TheOnlyJ3 @LGAairport Hello, thanks for contacting us. We are sorry to hear about your experience. Kindly send us a private message along with your 6-digit confirmation code and passenger names on the reservation if you still need assistance. -Bryan.

-Edgar
